index.name: Paul Zolnierczyk
index.bio: I'm a Team Lead and Senior Developer for Infinity Interactive as well as a Xamarin Certified Developer.  At Infinity Interactive I help our clients design and develop applications that meet their business needs.  Our most recent Xamarin app released is called TaxChat.   When it comes to .NET I've given a talk at the 2016 Chicago Coder Conference but prior to that I've given Java related talks at Midwest Higher Education User group as well as the Higher Education User Group Alliance Conference.
index.title: Paul Zolnierczyk | Speakers | MKE DOT NET
